card.name: Restless Spire
card.text: Restless Spire enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. {U}{R}: Until end of turn, Restless Spire becomes a 2/1 blue and red Elemental creature with "As long as it's your turn, this creature has first strike." It's still a land. Whenever Restless Spire attacks, scry 1.

card.name: Return Triumphant
card.text: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Create a Young Hero Role token attached to it. (Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, if its toughness is 3 or less, put a +1/+1 counter on it." If you put another Role on the creature later, put this one into the graveyard.)

card.name: Return from the Wilds
card.text: Choose two — • Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffled. • Create a 1/1 white Human creature token. • Create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

card.name: Rootrider Faun
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Rowan's Grim Search
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) If this spell was bargained, look at the top four cards of your library, then put up to two of them back on top of your library in any order and the rest into your graveyard. You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

card.name: Rowan, Scion of War
card.text: Menace {T}: Spells you cast this turn that are black and/or red cost {X} less to cast, where X is the amount of life you lost this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Rowan, Scion of War
card.text: Menace {T}: Spells you cast this turn that are black and/or red cost {X} less to cast, where X is the amount of life you lost this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Royal Treatment
card.text: Target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn. Create a Royal Role token attached to that creature. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has ward {1}.)

card.name: Ruby, Daring Tracker
card.text: Haste Whenever Ruby, Daring Tracker attacks while you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Ruby gets +2/+2 until end of turn. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Sharae of Numbing Depths
card.text: When Sharae of Numbing Depths enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.) Whenever you tap one or more untapped creatures your opponents control, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Skybeast Tracker
card.text: Reach Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

card.name: Sleight of Hand
card.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Sleight of Hand
card.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Solitary Sanctuary
card.text: When Solitary Sanctuary enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.) Whenever you tap an untapped creature an opponent controls, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Soul-Guide Lantern
card.text: When Soul-Guide Lantern enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard. {T}, Sacrifice Soul-Guide Lantern: Exile each opponent's graveyard. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Soul-Guide Lantern: Draw a card.

card.name: Specter of Mortality
card.text: Flying When Specter of Mortality enters the battlefield, you may exile one or more creature cards from your graveyard. When you do, each other creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards exiled this way.

card.name: Specter of Mortality
card.text: Flying When Specter of Mortality enters the battlefield, you may exile one or more creature cards from your graveyard. When you do, each other creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards exiled this way.

card.name: Spellbook Vendor
card.text: Vigilance At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {1}. When you do, create a Sorcerer Role token attached to target creature you control. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, scry 1.")

card.text: Vigilance At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {1}. When you do, create a Sorcerer Role token attached to target creature you control. card.name: Spiteful Hexmage
card.text: When Spiteful Hexmage enters the battlefield, create a Cursed Role token attached to target creature you control. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature is 1/1.)

card.name: Spiteful Hexmage
card.text: When Spiteful Hexmage enters the battlefield, create a Cursed Role token attached to target creature you control. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature is 1/1.)

card.name: Stonesplitter Bolt
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Stonesplitter Bolt deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker. If this spell was bargained, it deals twice X damage to that permanent instead.

card.name: Stroke of Midnight
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Human creature token.

card.name: Stroke of Midnight
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Human creature token.

card.name: Sweettooth Witch
card.text: When Sweettooth Witch enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") {2}, Sacrifice a Food: Target player loses 2 life.

card.name: Syr Armont, the Redeemer
card.text: When Syr Armont, the Redeemer enters the battlefield, create a Monster Role token attached to another target creature you control. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample.) Enchanted creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Syr Ginger, the Meal Ender
card.text: Syr Ginger, the Meal Ender has trample, hexproof, and haste as long as an opponent controls a planeswalker. Whenever another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Syr Ginger and scry 1. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Syr Ginger: You gain life equal to its power.

card.name: Syr Ginger, the Meal Ender
card.text: Syr Ginger, the Meal Ender has trample, hexproof, and haste as long as an opponent controls a planeswalker. Whenever another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Syr Ginger and scry 1. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Syr Ginger: You gain life equal to its power.

card.name: Taken by Nightmares
card.text: Exile target creature. If you control an enchantment, scry 2.

card.name: Talion's Messenger
card.text: Flying Whenever you attack with one or more Faeries, draw a card, then discard a card. When you discard a card this way, put a +1/+1 counter on target Faerie you control.

card.name: Talion's Messenger
card.text: Flying Whenever you attack with one or more Faeries, draw a card, then discard a card. When you discard a card this way, put a +1/+1 counter on target Faerie you control.

card.name: Talion, the Kindly Lord
card.text: Flying As Talion, the Kindly Lord enters the battlefield, choose a number between 1 and 10. Whenever an opponent casts a spell with mana value, power, or toughness equal to the chosen number, that player loses 2 life and you draw a card.

card.name: Talion, the Kindly Lord
card.text: Flying As Talion, the Kindly Lord enters the battlefield, choose a number between 1 and 10. Whenever an opponent casts a spell with mana value, power, or toughness equal to the chosen number, that player loses 2 life and you draw a card.

card.name: Tangled Colony
card.text: Tangled Colony can't block. When Tangled Colony dies, create X 1/1 black Rat creature tokens with "This creature can't block," where X is the amount of damage dealt to it this turn.

card.name: Tangled Colony
card.text: Tangled Colony can't block. When Tangled Colony dies, create X 1/1 black Rat creature tokens with "This creature can't block," where X is the amount of damage dealt to it this turn.

card.name: Tanglespan Lookout
card.text: Whenever an Aura enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

card.name: Tanglespan Lookout
card.text: Whenever an Aura enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

card.name: Tattered Ratter
card.text: Whenever a Rat you control becomes blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: The Apprentice's Folly
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Choose target nontoken creature you control that doesn't have the same name as a token you control. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it isn't legendary, is a Reflection in addition to its other types, and has haste. III — Sacrifice all Reflections you control.

card.name: The End
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if your life total is 5 or less. Exile target creature or planeswalker. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that permanent and exile them. That player shuffles, then draws card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

card.name: The End
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if your life total is 5 or less. Exile target creature or planeswalker. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that permanent and exile them. That player shuffles, then draws card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

card.name: The Goose Mother
card.text: Flying The Goose Mother enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When The Goose Mother enters the battlefield, create half X Food tokens, rounded up. Whenever The Goose Mother attacks, you may sacrifice a Food. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: The Goose Mother
card.text: Flying The Goose Mother enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When The Goose Mother enters the battlefield, create half X Food tokens, rounded up. Whenever The Goose Mother attacks, you may sacrifice a Food. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: The Huntsman's Redemption
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. II — You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature or basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. III — Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: The Princess Takes Flight
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Exile up to one target creature. II — Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. III — Return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Three Blind Mice
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.) I — Create a 1/1 white Mouse creature token. II, III — Create a token that's a copy of target token you control. IV — Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Three Bowls of Porridge
card.text: {2}, {T}: Choose one that hasn't been chosen — • Three Bowls of Porridge deals 2 damage to target creature. • Tap target creature. • Sacrifice Three Bowls of Porridge. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Thunderous Debut
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Look at the top twenty cards of your library. You may reveal up to two creature cards from among them. If this spell was bargained, put the revealed cards onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put the revealed cards into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Thunderous Debut
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Look at the top twenty cards of your library. You may reveal up to two creature cards from among them. If this spell was bargained, put the revealed cards onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put the revealed cards into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Torch the Tower
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Torch the Tower deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If this spell was bargained, instead it deals 3 damage to that permanent and you scry 1. If a permanent dealt damage by Torch the Tower would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Torch the Tower
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Torch the Tower deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If this spell was bargained, instead it deals 3 damage to that permanent and you scry 1. If a permanent dealt damage by Torch the Tower would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Totentanz, Swarm Piper
card.text: Whenever Totentanz, Swarm Piper or another nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 black Rat creature token with "This creature can't block." {1}{B}: Target attacking Rat you control gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Tough Cookie
card.text: When Tough Cookie enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") {2}{G}: Target noncreature artifact you control becomes a 4/4 artifact creature until end of turn. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Tough Cookie: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Troublemaker Ouphe
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) When Troublemaker Ouphe enters the battlefield, if it was bargained, exile target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

card.name: Troyan, Gutsy Explorer
card.text: {T}: Add {G}{U}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with mana value 5 or greater or spells with {X} in their mana costs. {U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Twisted Fealty
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Create a Wicked Role token attached to up to one target creature. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. When this Aura is put into a graveyard, each opponent loses 1 life.)

card.name: Twisted Sewer-Witch
card.text: When Twisted Sewer-Witch enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Rat creature token with "This creature can't block." Then for each Rat you control, create a Wicked Role token attached to that Rat. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. When this Aura is put into a graveyard, each opponent loses 1 life.)

card.name: Voracious Vermin
card.text: When Voracious Vermin enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Rat creature token with "This creature can't block." Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Voracious Vermin.

card.name: Warehouse Tabby
card.text: Whenever an enchantment you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Rat creature token with "This creature can't block." {1}{B}: Warehouse Tabby gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Werefox Bodyguard
card.text: Flash When Werefox Bodyguard enters the battlefield, exile up to one other target non-Fox creature until Werefox Bodyguard leaves the battlefield. {1}{W}, Sacrifice Werefox Bodyguard: You gain 2 life.

card.text: Flash When Werefox Bodyguard enters the battlefield, exile up to one other target non-Fox creature until Werefox Bodyguard leaves the battlefield. {1}{W}, Sacrifice Werefox Bodyguard: You gain 2 life.
